label: Figure 1
caption: Bilateral axilla showing erythematous lesions with associated erosions, some fissuring, crusts, pigmentation and scale at friction sites in a patient with HHD

label: Figure 2
caption: Bilateral inguinal region showing erythematous pigmentation of the lesions with associated crusts and scaling finger nails with faint longitudinal streaks of white bands

label: Figure 3
caption: Day five post treatment with azathioprine, indicating healing erythematous axilla with some healing fissures, crustations and scaling

label: Figure 4
caption: Left axilla of the HHD patient after 3 months on azathioprine. There is some post inflammatory pigmentation and crustation and scaling in the central region of axilla

label: Figure 1
caption: Extensive suprabasal acantholysis with intraepidermal bullae and keratinocytes with “dilapidated brick wall” appearance (Hematoxylin & eosin, ×40).

label: Figure 2
caption: Exfoliative erythroderma. Intertriginous areas with extensive erythema and tendency to maceration.

label: Figure 3
caption: Diffuse erythema, vesicular lesions, erosions, and crusts in lower limbs close to inguinal folds.
